description.en: Resets your DEX stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.ar: Resets your DEX stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.br: Reembolsa TODOS os pontos que foram anteriormente adicionados em DES para que possam ser utilizados novamente. Aplica-se apenas à sua página de atributos atual.
description.cns: 敏捷属性点初始化，仅对当前属性页有效。
description.de: Setzt die DEX Werte zurück. Gilt nur für die aktuelle Stat Seite.
description.fi: Resets your DEX stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.fil: Resets your DEX stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.fr: Parchemin permettant de redistribuer une fois les points mis dans la statistique de dextérité (DEX) sur la page actuelle.
description.id: Mereset statistik DEX anda. Hanya berlaku untuk halaman stat anda saat ini.
description.it: Resets your DEX stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.jp: 敏捷性を初期化します。現在のステータスページにのみ適用
description.kr: Resets your DEX stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.nl: Resets your DEX stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.pl: Resets your DEX stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.ru: Resets your DEX stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.sp: Resetea tus estadísticas de DEX. Solo se aplica a sus estadísticas actuales.
description.sw: Resets your DEX stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.th: รีเซ็ต DEX ของคุณ มีผลกับหน้า Stat ปัจจุบันเท่านั้น
description.tw: 重置您的敏捷數值。 僅適用於您當前的統計頁面。
description.vi: Đặt lại DEX stats. Chỉ áp dụng cho trang stat hiện tại của bạn.
